title: Denny Follows Shelly's Trail
story_setup: Denny the baby crab sees Shelly the sea turtle swimming slowly through the tall kelp forest. Shelly left a trail of bubbles for Denny to follow.
instruction: Draw a line to help Denny follow Shelly's trail through the kelp.
tts_instruction: Can you help Denny follow Shelly's bubble trail? Draw a gentle line with your finger to guide Denny through the swaying kelp forest to reach his friend Shelly.

character_start.description: Bright orange-red baby crab, curious and cheerful, small claws, big expressive eyes
character_start.name: Denny

character_end.description: Green sea turtle with a patterned shell, slow but steady, tells stories
character_end.name: Shelly

educational_question: What do you think grows in a kelp forest besides the tall green kelp plants?
fun_fact: Sea turtles can hold their breath underwater for up to 5 hours when they rest.
completion_message: Denny found Shelly in the peaceful kelp forest and now they can explore together.
